DOC.detailed_description: Secondary objective include document toxicity associate treatment regimen , estimate response rate survival participant large cell lymphoma treat protocol . High-dose methotrexate 8 gm/m2 Day 1 leucovorin rescue Ifosfamide 2 gm/m2/day day 2-4 ( total 3 day ) Etoposide ( VP-16 ) 200 mg/m2/day Days 2-4 ( total 3 day ) Dexamethasone 40 mg/m2/day IV day 1-4 ( give IV PO daily x 4 ) Intrathecal MHA , age adjust dosage . Consolidation COPADM chemotherapy 2 cycle - cyclophosphamide , vincristine , prednisone , adriamycin , high-dose methotrexate COPAM # 1 High dose methotrexate ( HD MTX ) 5 gm/m2 IV 4 hour Day 1 leucovorin rescue ; Doxorubicin 60 mg/m2 IV 6 hour Day 2 , Vincristine 2.0 mg/m2 ( 2.0 mg max ) Day 1 , Cyclophosphamide 500 mg/m2/day ( divide every 12 hour ) Days 2-4 , Prednisone 60 mg/m2 ( divide bid ) Days 1-5 , Intrathecal MHA , age adjust dosage . COPADM # 2 - like COPADM # 1 except : 1. cyclophosphamide dose increase 1 gm/m2/day divide every 12 hour Days 2-4 , 2. second dose vincristine give Day 6 . DAC chemotherapy x 1 cycle - Dexamethasone , cytarabine , carboplatin Carboplatin ( AUC 8 ) Day 1 ; Ara-C 2 gm/m2/dose q12 x 2 Day 2 Dexamethasone 40 mg/m2/day Days 1-4 ; ITMHA dose age adjust .
